mapper.select: select count(1) from (select id,code,brand from (select id,code,brand from t_cuttingtool group by seriesname) as series where left(`code`,2)=#{code} group by brand) as brand
select count(1) from (select id,code,seriesname from (select id,code,seriesname from t_cuttingtool group by seriesname) as series where left(`code`,2)=#{code} group by seriesname) as sn

select * from ( (select count(1) as b1 from (select id,code,brand from (select id,code,brand from t_cuttingtool group by seriesname) as series where left(`code`,2)="01" group by brand) as brand) brand1, (select count(1) as b2 from (select id,code,brand from (select id,code,brand from t_cuttingtool group by seriesname) as series where left(`code`,2)="02" group by brand) as brand) brand2, (select count(1) as b3 from (select id,code,brand from (select id,code,brand from t_cuttingtool group by seriesname) as series where left(`code`,2)="04" group by brand) as brand) brand3, (select count(1) as b4 from (select id,code,brand from (select id,code,brand from t_cuttingtool group by seriesname) as series where left(`code`,2)="05" group by brand) as brand) brand4, (select count(1) as sn1 from (select id,code,seriesname from (select id,code,seriesname from t_cuttingtool group by seriesname) as series where left(`code`,2)="01" group by seriesname) as sn) sn1, (select count(1) as sn2 from (select id,code,seriesname from (select id,code,seriesname from t_cuttingtool group by seriesname) as series where left(`code`,2)="02" group by seriesname) as sn) sn2, (select count(1) as sn3 from (select id,code,seriesname from (select id,code,seriesname from t_cuttingtool group by seriesname) as series where left(`code`,2)="04" group by seriesname) as sn) sn3, (select count(1) as sn4 from (select id,code,seriesname from (select id,code,seriesname from t_cuttingtool group by seriesname) as series where left(`code`,2)="05" group by seriesname) as sn) sn4 )

select * from t_cuttingtool where id=0
or id = #{id}
SELECT * from t_cuttingtool where match(code) against(#{code} in boolean mode) group by seriesname
SELECT * from t_cuttingtool where match(code) against(#{code} in boolean mode)
SELECT * from t_cuttingtool group by seriesname
SELECT * from t_cuttingtool group by brand
SELECT * from t_cuttingtool t where t.id=#{id}
